When you use + with a char, you are working with decimal, not with binary

10010110 >> 6 = 00000010 & 00000001 = 00000000 -> 0 + '0' = 48 = '0' // binary + decimal

10010110 >> 0 = 10010110 & 00000001 = 00000000 -> 0 + '0' = 48 = '0'
